#DAG

outcome = murder
exposure = post

```{r}
murder ~ unemployrt + blackm_15_24 + whitem_15_24 + blackm_25_44 + whitem_25_44 + poverty + robbery_gun_r (previous_yr) + popwt + l_exp_subsidy (lag) + l_exp_pubwelfare (lag) + l_lagprisoner + l_police (lag) + post + years_after_treat

post ~ homicide + robbery + assault + burglary + larceny + motor + murder (lagged) + political
  #find variable for political affiliation

poverty ~ umemployrt + l_exp_subsidy (lag) + l_exp_pubwelfare (lag) + l_income

jhcitizen_c ~ post + robbery + assault + burglary + larceny + motor + murder + robbery_gun_r + popwt

robbery_gun_r ~ poverty

l_police ~ political + income

```


```{r}
castle_dag <- dagify(
  murder ~ blackm_15_24 + whitem_15_24 + blackm_25_44 + whitem_25_44 + poverty + popwt + robbery_gun_r + l_police + post + years_after_treat + robbery,
  
  post ~ homicide + robbery_gun_r + assault + burglary + larceny + motor + murder_lag,
  
  burglary ~ poverty + blackm_15_24 + whitem_15_24 + blackm_25_44 + whitem_25_44,
  homicide ~ poverty + blackm_15_24 + whitem_15_24 + blackm_25_44 + whitem_25_44,
  larceny ~ poverty + blackm_15_24 + whitem_15_24 + blackm_25_44 + whitem_25_44,
  motor ~ poverty + blackm_15_24 + whitem_15_24 + blackm_25_44 + whitem_25_44,
  robbery ~ poverty + blackm_15_24 + whitem_15_24 + blackm_25_44 + whitem_25_44,
  
  robbery_gun_r ~ poverty + robbery,
  
  
  poverty ~ unemployrt + l_exp_subsidy + l_exp_pubwelfare + l_income,
  
  l_police ~ l_income,
  
  outcome = "murder",
  exposure = "post",
  labels = c(
    murder = "Murder",
    murder_lag = "Murder Lagged",
    unemployrt = "Unemployment",
    blackm_15_24 = "Black Males 15-24",
    whitem_15_24 = "White Males 15-24",
    blackm_25_44 = "Black Males 25-44",
    whitem_25_44 = "White Males 25-44",
    poverty = "Poverty",
    popwt = "Population",
    robbery_gun_r = "Armed Robbery Prop.",
    l_exp_subsidy = "Subsidy",
    l_exp_pubwelfare = "Welfare",
    l_police = "Police",
    post = "Castle Doctrine",
    years_after_treat = "Years Post Castle",
    
    homicide = "Homicides",
    robbery = "Robbery",
    assault = "Assaults",
    burglary = "Burglary",
    larceny = "Larceny",
    motor = "Auto Theft",
    l_income = "Income")
)


```
